TopicTitle: Parts to save celestial body description

Articles.Content:
Alright,

So you know how the wiki has a full description of each planet (or moon)?

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Eve

there should be parts where instead of going to the wikipedia all the time to plan your landing, you can send unmanned satellites and rovers first to gather most data. But after that, you can also save the data to where you can view it in the space center.

Then you can refer to it for future manned trips.

And sometimes data would be slightly inaccurate for more realism.
The tracking station already gives a lot of information about each planet and moon, and it is already slightly inaccurate.

As I said, I'd like it a bit more realistic to where you had to find out the info yourself, instead of it already being there.
